short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension lets you note something from the page that you are reading, to treenote.tk

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Select text on current page, press 'TN' button to save note

Next time you visit this page, you can review your notes on this page

You can go to treenote.hotoc.vn and review all your notes, too.
